title: Fungal nail infection
localHeader: Fungal nail infections are common. Theyâ€™re not serious but they can take a long time to treat.

cards.caption: Fungal nail infections usually start at the edge of the nail.
cards.alt: Fungal infection at the edge of the nail

cards.caption: They often then spread to the middle. The nail becomes discoloured and lifts off.
cards.alt: Infection spread to the middle of the toe

cards.caption: The nail becomes brittle and pieces can break off. It can cause pain and swelling in the skin around the nail.
